fullReleaseNotes:
v2.1
 - Added device info, CPU statistics and Licence pages.
 - Added Indonesian translation.
 - Introduced a signature check for app updates.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.0
 - Introduced a new page to display NFS mode changing in real-time.
 - Updated app icon and logo.
 - Flasher will now use in-built file picker (configurable).
 - Added a Credits page (in About) with an in-built translator.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.9
 - Largely improved module flashing.
 - Fixed crashing app on certain situations.
 - Detect and prevent using the app when illegal applications installed.
 - Overall code improvements.
 - Removed Nuked analytics from conflict list.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.8
 - Added a flashing progress screen.
 - Fixed rebooting from app not working after flashing.
 - Use Magisk BusyBox binaries for more tasks.
 - Update check will now work on all devices.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.7
 - Completely removed AdMob ad banner.
 - Added a full screen flashing view.
 - Updated to use BusyBox binaries for several tasks.
 - Added pt-rPT translations.
 - Updated Russian translations.
 - More material style updates.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.6
 - Rebuilt app from (nearly) scratch.
 - Switched app layout to BottomNav view.
 - App will now follow system theme.
 - Removed pro-user check.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.5
 - Removed on-boot service.
 - Updated pro-user check.
 - Updated build tools.
 - Updated DNS options.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.4
 - Implement module flashing from app.
 - Largely re-designed App UI.
 - Brand New About page, Logs view and Change_logs.
 - Implemented On-Boot service to help module to execute at boot.
 - Cleaned a bunch of unused code from app.
 - Improved Root handling.
 - Improved conflicts app detection.
 - Replaced toast messages with snackbar
 - Added Russian, German, Spanish, French and Italian translations.
 - Removed option to input Registration Key.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.3
 - Switched to libsu.
 - Updated pro-user check.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.2
 - Prevent users to access the app, if NFS initialization is not completed.
 - Show warning message to avoid using performance governor.
 - Added super sampling.
 - Moved About dialogue to the settings menu.
 - Updated pro-user checking.
 - Added more apps to conflicting programs list.
 - Updated Analytics/Ads Disabler.
 - Overall code cleaning & improvements.
 - Update build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.1
 - Fixed magisk log not working for basic users.
 - Updated settings UI.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.0
 - Initial Release.
releaseNotes:
Change-logs
 - Added a device info, CPU statistics and Licence pages.
 - Added Indonesian translation.
 - Introduced a signature check for app updates.
 - Miscellaneous changes.
